articles.title: Biologist study finds mercury in predator peregrine falcons
articles.description:
LAS VEGAS (AP) - A Nevada wildlife researcher has found that not even the fastest bird on Earth can escape mercury contamination. 
 The toxic element is turning up in feathers of peregrine falcons from coast to coast, including those at the Lake Mead National…
